entry.string:
Caution : this password has just been generated by the system and assigned to this user. This password has not been sent by mail to the user.
For security, It's the only time you will see this password in clear text, please write it down if you want to send it to the user.
Click here to get back to the users list
entry.translation: Click Aquí para obtener la lista de usuarios

entry.string: This forms allow you to send a notification to the changed user(s)
entry.translation: Este formulario permirte enviar una notificación para el cambio de usuario(s)
